author: admin
title: Global DSP Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 3:57 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About digital signal processorDigital signal processor (DSP) is a special purpose circuit that deciphers digital signals through mathematical calculations and provides a modified and refined output for users. The primary objective of DSP is to continuously process real-time analog signals to digital, and then into discreet digital values before processing them to extract refined version of digital signal. DSPs are integrated into devices that are required to do multiple processes in real time. The demand for DSPs in various sectors has decreased because of the availability of substitutes and technological advances in the area of computer science. Technavio's analysts forecast the global DSP market to a decline at a CAGR of (5.96)% during 2014-2019. Covered in this Report This report covers the current scenario and the growth prospects of the global DSP market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of DSP. It considers sales of DSP to OEMs but not aftermarket sales. Technavio's report, Global DSP Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the Americas, APAC, and EMEA. It presents a detailed analysis of the top 4 Key Vendors in the market, but does not present the share or ranking of the top four vendors in the market. In addition, the report discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends that are emerging in the market.Key regions
